data.title: “The History of Mar Yabalakhi and Rabban Sauma” as a Source for the Study of Intercultural Interactions in the Yuan Empire and the Ilkhanate
data.abstractNote: The relevance of this problem is due to the need for a comprehensive analysis of the «History of Mar Yabalakhi and Rabban Sauma» as a historical source. The analysis of the text makes it possible to identify such a phenomenon as intercultural interactions in which the Nestorian population of the Ilkhanate and the Yuan Empire were involved. These connections confirm the point of view of Russian and foreign historians about the «medieval globalization» that took place on the territory of Pax Mongolica. The purpose of this article is an attempt to identify the main directions of intercultural interactions by analyzing the text of the «History of Mar Yabalakhi and Rabban Sauma». The main method is a critical analysis of the source. The article examines cultural contacts between various Christian confessions, as well as interfaith, as well as between the peoples of Central Asia and the Middle East.
